SEARCH
Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.lupus.rest

Class GameActionsGetRR

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.webapp.lupus.rest.AbstractRR
it.unipd.dei.webapp.lupus.rest.GameActionsGetRR
All Implemented Interfaces:
RestResource
public class GameActionsGetRR extends AbstractRR
Handles the HTTP GET request to retrieve game actions based on the current game phase. It contains methods to handle both day and night phases of the game.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
LupusInFabula Group

  • Field Details

    • gameID

      private final int gameID
      The ID of the game.

    • nightAction

      private static final Map<String,String> nightAction
      Map containing the actions available during the night phase of the game. The key is the role name, and the value is the corresponding action.

    • playerRole

      private static Map<String,String> playerRole
      Map containing the players and their roles in the game. The key is the player's name, and the value is the player's role.

    • deadPlayers

      private static Map<String,Boolean> deadPlayers
      Map indicating whether players are dead or alive in the game. The key is the player's name, and the value is a boolean indicating if the player is dead.

    • wolfPlayers

      List<String> wolfPlayers
      List with all roles that are Wolf, Berserk, Explorer or Puppy

      Constructs a new GameActionsGetRR object with the specified game ID, request, response, and data source.

      res - The HTTP servlet response.

  • Method Details

    • doServe

      protected void doServe() throws IOException
      Description copied from class: AbstractRR
      Performs the actual logic needed for serving the REST request.

      Subclasses have to implement this method in order to define the actual strategy for serving the REST request.

      Specified by:
      doServe in class AbstractRR
      Throws:
      IOException - if any error occurs in the client/server communication.

    • handleDayPhase

      private void handleDayPhase() throws IOException
      Handles the day phase of the game. Generates action targets for voting.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • handleNightPhase

      private void handleNightPhase() throws IOException, SQLException
      Handles the night phase of the game, generating action targets based on the roles' actions.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs while accessing the database.

    • playerWithRole

      private List<String> playerWithRole(String role)
      Retrieves a list of players with the specified role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role for which to retrieve players.
      Returns:
      A list of players with the specified role.

    • isValidTarget

      private boolean isValidTarget(String player, String targetPlayer, String role) throws SQLException
      Checks if the specified target player is a valid target for the given role.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who is executing the action
      targetPlayer - The player to be checked as a target.
      role - The role of the player performing the action.
      Returns:
      true if the target player is valid for the given role, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL exception occurs.

    • getNightAction

      private String getNightAction(String role) throws SQLException
      Gets the night action for the specified role.
      Parameters:
      role - The role for which to retrieve the night action.
      Returns:
      The night action associated with the specified role.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL exception occurs.
